gobblin.runtime.cli

Class ConstructorAndPublicMethodsCliObjectFactory<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.runtime.cli.PublicMethodsCliObjectFactory<T>
      • gobblin.runtime.cli.ConstructorAndPublicMethodsCliObjectFactory<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CliObjectFactory<T>

    public class ConstructorAndPublicMethodsCliObjectFactory<T>
extends PublicMethodsCliObjectFactory<T>
    A helper class for automatically inferring Options from the constructor and public methods in a class. For method inference, see PublicMethodsCliObjectFactory. Options are inferred from the constructor as follows: 1. The helper will search for exactly one constructor with only String arguments and which is annotated with CliObjectSupport. 2. For each parameter of the constructor, the helper will create a required Option.
